Text: Scorpions are predatory arachnids of the order Scorpiones.

Text: Scorpion:  They have eight legs and are easily recognized by the pair of grasping pedipalps and the narrow, segmented tail, often carried in a characteristic forward curve over the back, ending with a venomous stinger.
